SEARCH
Package com.glamdring.greenZenith.externals.database

Class GZDBConnector

java.lang.Object
com.glamdring.greenZenith.externals.database.GZDBConnector
public class GZDBConnector extends Object
Provides methods for connecting to a MySQL database, performing various CRUD operations, and retrieving table information. It utilizes a JDBC Driver and some default credentials.
Since:
0.1
Version:
2.1.1

    Field

    Establishes the connection to the desired MySQL Server.

    The constant string indicating the default database URL.

    The constant string indicating the default database user.

    executor
    Executes multiple CRUD actions, prepares different statement strings, establishes inputs and outputs for the CRUD operations.

    preparedStatement
    Prepares different SQL statements for the CRUD operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • GZDBConnector

      public GZDBConnector() throws GZDBResultException
      The main constructor for this class, utilizes our default MySQL connection credentials.
      Throws:
      GZDBResultException - If the JDBC driver cannot be found or the default arguments for accessing the database cannot connect resolve a connection, this exception will be thrown. For more information @see GZDBResultException

  • Method Details

    • insert

      public void insert(GZDBTables table, LinkedHashMap<String,Object> insertMap) throws GZDBResultException
      Performs an insertion into the database with a given map.
      Parameters:
      table - The table in which the SQL action will be performed. @see GZDBTables
      insertMap - A map that defines the input to use for SQL Actions.
      Throws:
      GZDBResultException - A message indicating which SQL Action or Query failed and the map that made the failure happen. @see GZDBResultException

    • select

      public ArrayList<LinkedHashMap<String,Object>> select(GZDBTables table, LinkedHashMap<String,Object> selectmap) throws GZDBResultException
      Performs a selection from the database and returns the matching elements contained in a list.
      Parameters:
      table - The table in which the SQL action will be performed. @see GZDBTables
      selectmap - A map that defines the restrictions to use for the SQL Query.
      Returns:
      A list providing maps that contain the different entries given by the SQL Query.
      Throws:
      GZDBResultException - A message indicating which SQL Action or Query failed and the map that made the failure happen. @see GZDBResultException

    • selectAll

      public ArrayList<LinkedHashMap<String,Object>> selectAll(GZDBTables table) throws GZDBResultException
      Performs a selection from the database and returns all the elements of the given table.
      Parameters:
      table - The table in which the SQL action will be performed. @see GZDBTables
      Returns:
      A list providing maps that contain the different entries given by the SQL Query.
      Throws:
      GZDBResultException - A message indicating which SQL Action or Query failed and the map that made the failure happen. @see GZDBResultException

    • update

      public void update(GZDBTables table, LinkedHashMap<String,Object> updateMap, LinkedHashMap<String,Object> restrictionMap) throws GZDBResultException
      Performs an update of the datab of a certain table with the provided restrictions.
      Parameters:
      table - The table in which the SQL action will be performed. @see GZDBTables
      updateMap - A map that defines the updated data.
      restrictionMap - A map that defines the restrictions for updating an entry.
      Throws:
      GZDBResultException - A message indicating which SQL Action or Query failed and the map that made the failure happen. @see GZDBResultException

    • delete

      public void delete(GZDBTables table, LinkedHashMap<String,Object> deleteMap) throws GZDBResultException
      Performs the deletion of a specific entry with the given restrictions.
      Parameters:
      table - The table in which the SQL action will be performed. @see GZDBTables
      deleteMap - A map that defines the restrictions for the deletion of an entry.
      Throws:
      GZDBResultException - A message indicating which SQL Action or Query failed and the map that made the failure happen. @see GZDBResultException

    • getTableFields

      public LinkedHashSet<String> getTableFields(GZDBTables table) throws GZDBResultException
      Executes an automatic SQL Query to look for the names of the different fields contained on a table.
      Parameters:
      table - The table to retrieve the field names. @see GDZBTables
      Returns:
      A set containing all the field names.
      Throws:
      GZDBResultException - Indicates a failiure on the automatic SQL Query caused by the table of input.

    • getTableTypes

      public LinkedHashMap<String,String> getTableTypes(GZDBTables table) throws GZDBResultException
      Executes an automatic SQL Query to look for the types and respective names of the different fields contained on a table.
      Parameters:
      table - The table to retrieve the field types. @see GDZBTables
      Returns:
      A map containing all the field types with names as keys.
      Throws:
      GZDBResultException - Indicates a failiure on the automatic SQL Query caused by the table of input.

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection()
      Retrieves the connection to the database, used mainly for BLOB creations.
      Returns:
      The connection to the database.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the connection to the database.
